title: 德外長：歐洲不能再完全依賴白宮

replies.msg:
GermanForeignOffice

"We can no longer fully rely on the White House", says Foreign Minister @HeikoMaas. In order to recalibrate our partnership with the US we need a united, confident and sovereign Europe! #EuropeUnited #Trump @GermanyintheEU



Maas: Europe can no longer rely on the United States

Heiko Mass, Germany's foreign minister, said on Monday that Europe could no longer rely on the USA. "To maintain our partnership with the USA we must readjust it," the German foreign minister told Germany's Funke newspaper group. "The first clear consequence can only be that we need to align ourselves even more closely in Europe."

Mass's comments were made just hours ahead of a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin in Helsinki, and came after Trump's call last week for NATO allies to spend more on defense, and his reference to the European Union as a "foe" in trade.

https://www.dw.com/en/maas-europe-can-no-longer-rely-on-the-united-states/a-44701663


應該係講緊佢係聯合記者會完全唔提ukraine
但係唔好唔記得黎緊仲有英國要脫歐，而英國係現時歐盟境內第一第二大既軍事體
仲有唔肯加軍費又想人照你 當初ukraine想歐盟幫拖，德國咪一樣turn a blind eye

replies.msg:
德國直到今日仲背負發動二戰，同埋最終戰敗、被盟軍分割成東西德既陰影
加上戰後西德國防幾乎完全由美國包辦，所以德國人普遍係冇國防意識
如果真係要搵一個歐盟成員國去負責歐盟既防務，呢個國家只有係法國
法國有核武，有核潛艇，有核動力航母，係一個袖珍版既軍事大國

冷戰期間法國最怕俄羅斯既坦克海鋼鐵洪流剷入巴黎
法國既紅線係萊茵河，如果西德軍隊頂唔住俄佬過萊茵河攻入西歐就會用核武
冷戰結束之後，俄羅斯對歐洲威脅始終未解除
除左俄羅斯之外，法國仲要保持足夠軍力介入非洲事務
